# UICollectionViewCell.DragState.dragging

**Case**

The cell is being dragged.

## Declaration

```swift
case dragging
```

## Constants

- **UICollectionViewCell.DragState.none**: The cell isn’t involved in a drag.
- **UICollectionViewCell.DragState.lifting**: The cell is being animated off of the surface of the collection view.

items.description: The cell isn’t involved in a drag.
